pages.name: Angel
pages.headline: Angel Olsen Announces New Album My Woman
pages.blurb: Following up on her 2014 album Burn Your Fire For No Witness, Angel Olsen announced her new album My Woman, due out on September 2nd. If the first single, Intern, is anything to go by, we might be seeing a more dynamic Angel. Check out the new single below!
pages.author: Alex H

pages.name: Phantogram You Dont Get Me High Anymore
pages.headline: Phantogram Release New Single You Don't Get Me High Anymore
pages.blurb: Phantogram release their new single You Don't Get Me High Anymore off their upcoming third album. Check out tour dates here .
pages.author: Alex H

pages.name: Clipping Release New EP
pages.headline: Clipping Release New EP Wriggle
pages.blurb: Following Daveed Diggs' Tony win for the massive hit Hamilton, Clipping have released an EP called Wriggle. A precursor to thier upcoming album, due to be released later this year.
pages.author: Alex H

pages.name: Portishead Cover ABBA
pages.headline: Portishead Cover ABBA
pages.blurb: Portishead released a new music video featuring a cover of ABBA's 1975 track SOS. The darker, more ominous track ends with the quote"We have far more in common than which divides us", attributed to the late British politician Jo Cox.
pages.author: Alex H
